description: The iterative cycle: n -> sum of digits of n^2 has only four distinct elements.
example: a(2) = 4 since 2 -> 4 -> 1+6 = 7 -> 4+9 = 13 -> 1+6+9 = 16 -> 2+5+6 = 13, thus {4,7,13,16} are the distinct elements of the iterative cycle of 2.
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), May 17 2001
